name: Power2
description:
Power2 is an addictive brain game. It's so addictive and motivating game.

Can you beat!!! Play to say... You can easily share your result with friends on different social media platforms.

OBJECTIVE:
Swipe to move the tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one and you get points for that! In this attempt, try to get a block of 16384 and you win the game!
There are 4 levels range from easy to fiendish, to match every single brain ability.
You and all your family member can play it.

Modes:
Easy mode: The smallest tile will be 32 where 90% of new tiles will be 32 and 10% will be 64.
Intermediate Mode: The smallest tile will be 16 where 80% of new tiles will be 16 and 10% will be 32 and 10% will be 64.
Hard Mode: The smallest tile will be 8 where 50% of new tiles will be 8 , 25% will be 16, 20% will be 32 and 5% will be 64.
Fiendish Mode:
The smallest tile will be 2 where 1% of new tiles will be 2, 24% will be 4, 50% will be 8 , 10% will be 16, 5% will be 32 , 2% will be 64, 1% will be 128 and 2% will be 4096.
Some Tips:
1. Keep calm and play slow.
2. Keep highest values at one of the bottom corners.
3. Start playing easy mode then move to other modes.
